_comment: Lengths are in mm, angles are in degrees.
This file has parameters for the sampling of the location of the occluders.
The occluders move as a rigid body, therefore their motion is not sampled independently for each subsystem.
If the parameter 'seed' is not 'null', then the seed of the internal random sampler will be set to that value
name: default device sampler

_comment: If 'apply' is false the other parameters are ignored and the orientation of the occluder is not perturbed.
The rotation is provided as an axis-angle in the coordinate system of the device.

The first coordinate is rotation around x (pantoscopic tilt); the second coordinate is rotation around y (yaw, or rotation around vertical); the third coordinate is rotation around z (roll, or how askew the occluders are).
If 'apply' is false the other parameters are ignored and the orientation of the occluder is not perturbed.
The translation is in the coordinate system of the device.
This is double the horizontal fit distribution from https://mixedrealitywiki.com/x/dDO7Bg
